metadata.title: Generated Gibs for The Renegade Collection 2.6
metadata.author: Epirasque (developer), Dalvest (artist)
metadata.description:
Provides Gibs (debris pieces that are shown whenever ships are destroyed) for the Multiverse mod The Renegade Collection 2.6.
This addon has to be patched after The Renegade Collection itself and should only be used for 2.6.
Special thanks to marcusian for consulting support.
